lesson.subtitle: Motion verbs: practice and integration
lesson.description: Learner can use all motion verbs fluently in narratives
objectives: Learner can use all motion verbs fluently in narratives
Learner can give complex directions using motion verbs
Learner can integrate literal and figurative motion
grammarFocus: All motion verbs and prefixes in context
